meanings.definition: Resembling a knob in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The handle on the drawer was knoblike and easy to grip.
meanings.sent2: The mushroom had a knoblike cap on top.
meanings.sent3: The knoblike button on the remote control was so big, it looked like a tiny door handle.
meanings.sent4: Her nose was so small and knoblike, it reminded me of a tiny pebble.
meanings.sent5: The knoblike protrusion on the tree trunk made it look like a fairy house entrance.
